overview: In recent years an overwhelming amount of propaganda has been disseminated concerning the supposed self-realization of becoming a female slave - the Submission craze that reached a peak with the publication of the "50 Shades" novels. The great Italian porn director Luca Damiano took a far more intelligent approach 20 years ago in "Love and Pain", lost in the In-Ex-Cess video catalog.
title: Love and Pain
